description:
NOTE: Due to Udemy's pricing change, this (and all HoneyPoint3D) class will be removed from Udemy as of April 1st, 2016.  Please check our website for our classes, offered at the same price. (honeypoint3d .com/education <--please fix this URL manually, as Udemy does not allow links in the course summary -thx) 

ALL content will be removed and PLEASE do not purchase this class here.  This class will only remain listed to help students migrate over to the other training website above.


Existing users, please e-mail nick@honeypoint3d .com (please fix that e-mail address as Udemy does not allow links here) to get set up on the new website.  Please reference your "name" here on Udemy so we can cross-reference your account.
title: 3D Figurine Modeling with Autodesk Meshmixer
